subject: Sales
title: Airbnb's Legendary Pitch Deck
description: A micro-lesson that makes Airbnb's Legendary Pitch Deck usable.

hook.text: Airbnb's original pitch deck was just ten slides. It raised $600,000 and launched a global empire.

buildup.text: The deck was simple: problem, solution, market size, traction, team, and ask. Nothing extra at all.

discovery.text: Every slide made one clear point. No clutter, no jargon, no text walls. Just clarity at every step.

twist.text: Dozens of investors said no first. The deck didn't change â€” the right audience eventually found it.

climax.text: Airbnb's deck is now taught in business schools. Simplicity and clarity outperform everything else.

punchline.text: Ten simple slides launched a billion-dollar company.

quiz.question: How many slides did Airbnb's original pitch deck contain?
